info.title: WebApplicationFirewallManagement
info.description: APIs to manage web application firewall rules.

localAddress.description: The virtual network gateway's local address.

asn.description: The autonomous system number of the remote BGP peer.

connectedDuration.description: For how long the peering has been up.

routesReceived.description: The number of routes learned from this peer.

messagesSent.description: The number of BGP messages sent.

messagesReceived.description: The number of BGP messages received.

BgpPeerStatusListResult.description: Response for list BGP peer status API service call.

bgpPeeringAddress.description: The BGP peering address and BGP identifier of this BGP speaker.

peerWeight.description: The weight added to routes learned from this BGP speaker.

bgpPeeringAddresses.description: BGP peering address with IP configuration ID for virtual network gateway.

CertificateAuthentication.description: Certificate Authentication information for a certificate based authentication connection.

outboundAuthCertificate.description: Keyvault secret ID for outbound authentication certificate.

link.description: Link to the Express Route circuit

location.description: Peering location of the Express Route Circuit

ConnectionResetSharedKey.description: The virtual network connection reset shared key.

keyLength.description: The virtual network connection reset shared key length, should between 1 and 128.

ConnectionSharedKey.description: Response for GetConnectionSharedKey API service call.

value.description: The virtual network connection shared key value.

nrpResourceUri.description: NRP Resource URI of the circuit

connectionName.description: Connection name associated with the circuit

nrpResourceUri.description: NRP Resource URI of the connection

status.description: The current status of the connection

lastUpdatedTime.description: Time when the connection was last updated

peeringLocations.description: A list of all the peering locations for the redundant routes

routes.description: A list of all the redundant routes in the peering locations

status.description: The current status of the test

startTimeUtc.description: Time when the test was started

endTimeUtc.description: Time when the test was completed

redundantRoutes.description: List of routes received from this peering as well as some other peering location

nonRedundantRoutes.description: List of al the routes that were received only from this peering location

wasSimulationSuccessful.description: Whether the failover simulation was successful or not

failoverConnectionDetails.description: List of all the failover connections for this peering location

ExpressRouteFailoverStopApiParameters.description: Start packet capture parameters on virtual network gateway.

wasSimulationSuccessful.description: Whether the failover simulation was successful or not

details.description: List of all the failover connections for this peering location

circuits.description: All circuits in the peering location

status.description: The current status of the test

startTime.description: Time when the test was started

endTime.description: Time when the test was completed

connections.description: All connections to the circuits in the peering location

testGuid.description: The unique GUID associated with the test

issues.description: A list of all issues with the test

isVerified.description: Whether the customer was able to establish connectivity through this failover connection or not

GatewayCustomBgpIpAddressIpConfiguration.description: GatewayCustomBgpIpAddressIpConfiguration for a virtual network gateway connection.

ipConfigurationId.description: The IpconfigurationId of ipconfiguration which belongs to gateway.

customBgpIpAddress.description: The custom BgpPeeringAddress which belongs to IpconfigurationId.

overallScore.description: Current Resiliency Score for the gateway

scoreChange.description: Update in the Resiliency Score for the gateway from the last computed score

minScoreFromRecommendations.description: Minimum increase expected in the score if the at least one of the recommendations is applied for the gateway

maxScoreFromRecommendations.description: Maximum increase expected in the score if all of the recommendations are applied for the gateway

lastComputedTime.description: Timestamp denoting the last time when the resiliency score was computed for the gateway

nextEligibleComputeTime.description: Timestamp denoting the next eligible time to re-compute the resiliency score for the gateway

components.description: List of Resiliency based Recommendation Components for the gateway

callToActionText.description: Acton items to apply the recommendation

callToActionLink.description: Link to the public documentation for the associated recommendation

sourcePeer.description: The peer this route was learned from.

origin.description: The source this route was learned from.

GatewayRouteListResult.description: List of virtual network gateway routes.

locations.description: List of different locations from where the routes are learned

lastComputedTime.description: Timestamp denoting the last time when the route sets were computed for the gateway

nextEligibleComputeTime.description: Timestamp denoting the next eligible time to re-compute the route sets for the gateway

circuitsMetadataMap.description: Dictionary containing map of the circuit id and circuit details

ipconfigurationId.description: The ID of IP configuration which belongs to gateway.

defaultBgpIpAddresses.description: The list of default BGP peering addresses which belong to IP configuration.

customBgpIpAddresses.description: The list of custom BGP peering addresses which belong to IP configuration.

tunnelIpAddresses.description: The list of tunnel public IP addresses which belong to IP configuration.

IpsecPolicy.description: An IPSec Policy configuration for a virtual network gateway connection.

saLifeTimeSeconds.description: The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) lifetime in seconds for a site to site VPN tunnel.

saDataSizeKilobytes.description: The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) payload size in KB for a site to site VPN tunnel.

dhGroup.description: The DH Group used in IKE Phase 1 for initial SA.

pfsGroup.description: The Pfs Group used in IKE Phase 2 for new child SA.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the local network gateway resource.

RadiusAuthServer.description: Gateway or VpnServerConfiguration Radius server with radius secret details

radiusServerAddress.description: The address of this radius server.

radiusServerScore.description: The initial score assigned to this radius server.

radiusServerSecret.description: The secret used for this radius server. We will no longer return radiusServerSecret in VirtualNetworkGateway Create/Update/Get/List/UpdateTags APIs response. Please use VirtualNetworkGateway ListRadiusSecrets API to fetch radius server secrets.

name.description: Name of the Resiliency based Recommendation Component

maxScore.description: Max score that the gateway can achieve if the specified recommendation is applied

recommendations.description: List of Gateway Resiliency based Recommendations

pri.description: Flag to indicate if the route learned from the primary device is active or passive

sec.description: Flag to indicate if the route learned from the secondary device is active or passive

TrafficSelectorPolicy.description: An traffic selector policy for a virtual network gateway connection.

localAddressRanges.description: A collection of local address spaces in CIDR format.

remoteAddressRanges.description: A collection of remote address spaces in CIDR format.

egressBytesTransferred.description: The Egress Bytes Transferred in this connection.

lastConnectionEstablishedUtcTime.description: The time at which connection was established in Utc format.

id.description: The ID of VirtualNetworkGateway or LocalNetworkGateway resource.

externalMappings.description: The private IP address external mapping for NAT.

We will no longer return radiusServerSecret in VirtualNetworkGateway Create/Update/Get/List/UpdateTags APIs response.
